ovdesc.p: This application holds for a given BED account and diskette number, the start and end date of the diskette. The purpose of this application is to allow duplicate diskettes to be produced by quoting them diskette number, and provide a file which can be used for enquiries.

desc.p: Specifies the account number and diskette number which forms the key to the record.
2-14 numeric account number or 3-10 alphanumeric characters account Mnemonic. followed by "-" and a 1-3 digit number. (Mandatory input)
The end date of the period which is covered by the diskette number in the key to the record.
The start date of the period which is covered by the diskette number in the key to the record.
